TopicTitle: Did anyone manage to get Kerbal-VR running on version 1.12?

Articles.Content:
I've updated Kerbal Space Program to its final version, 1.12 and it won't run with the Kerbal-VR Mod. The loading screen won't show any progress. Removing the pluging made the game run again. So my idea was to get the source code from github (https://github.com/Vivero/Kerbal-VR) and compile it myself with the 1.12's libraries, which was successful, but still, the add-on won't work and the loading screen won't show any progress.

Did anyone manage to get Kerbal-VR running on 1.12?

Or does anyone have an idea, what to do?

Thanks in advance.
